amendment.description: To require wealthy Medicare beneficiaries to pay a greater share of their Medicare Part D premiums.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4240 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 56. Record Vote Number: 63.

action.text: Amendment SA 4240 proposed by Senator Ensign. (consideration: CR S2055; text: CR S2055) To require wealthy Medicare beneficiaries to pay a greater share of their Medicare Part D premiums.
